definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: There was no marked change in each phase of cell cycle in before and after treated by andriol.
sentences.chinese: 安雄组治疗前后各细胞周期均未见明显变化。

sentences.english: Permanent cells have left the cell cycle and are destined to senesce and die.
sentences.chinese: 永久性细胞已脱离细胞周期，注定要衰老和死亡。

sentences.english: The cell cycle and surface antigenic features were analyzed by flow cytometry.
sentences.chinese: 应用流式细胞仪测定细胞周期及细胞表面抗原特征。

sentences.english: Tim Hunt: discovered cycling, proteins that bind to the CDK molecules.
sentences.chinese: 发现了细胞周期蛋白，即与CDK分子相结合的蛋白。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE: To study the expression and clinical significance of apoptosis inhibitor survivin in nasopharyngeal carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨细胞周期抑制剂对脑神经细胞凋亡的影响。

sentences.english: Ubiquitylation has emerged as an important regulator of cell-cycle-specific repair.
sentences.chinese: 泛素化已成为细胞周期特意修复的重要调节因子。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Tougu Xiaotong granule on cell cycle of rabbit chondrocyte.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察透骨消痛颗粒对兔软骨细胞周期的影响。

sentences.english: In addition, ESCs differ from somatic cells in the cell-cycle regulation.
sentences.chinese: 相对于体细胞，胚胎干细胞的细胞周期调控非常特别。

sentences.english: The developments of tumor are linked with progressive disregulation of cell cycle.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤是由于渐进性细胞周期调控机制破坏引起的疾病。

sentences.english: P53 is an important proto-oncogene involved in the regulation of cell-cycle and apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白是参与调节细胞周期和凋亡过程的原癌基因。

sentences.english: The cell cycle events are related with proliferation and activation of astrocyte closely.
sentences.chinese: 细胞周期事件与星形胶质细胞的增殖活化密切相关。

sentences.english: The change of cell cycles wasobserved by flow cytometer (FCM).
sentences.chinese: 流式细胞仪观察细胞周期的变化。

sentences.english: The cell-cycle distribution was analyzed by propidium iodide staining.
sentences.chinese: 以碘化丙啶染色分析细胞周期的分布情况。

sentences.english: Effect of asiaticoside on cell cycle and apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: 积雪草苷对细胞周期和凋亡的影响。

sentences.english: The E2F transcription factors are key regulators in cell cycle regulation.
sentences.chinese: E2F转录因子是控制细胞周期的关键调控因子。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of pinealctomy and melatonin on the cell cycle distribution during T cell development in thymus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨松果体对胸腺分化发育时细胞周期的影响。
